messages.message:
Do we have any plans to be able to add descriptions/tags (with visibility potentially toggle-able) to `Build` *projects*?

It would be helpful not only when preparing enablement materials (such as notating which release/functionality is being covered by each project) to be able to use tags + descriptions instead of relying heavily on project naming conventions, but also I could imagine it may be helpful/practical for our users :slightly_smiling_face:

For example, here (see screenshot) are some ways that I have been naming projects in order organize them for demo-use (applies to client-facing demos as well, but specifically, the screenshot here applies to advancement sessions)

we actually already have the capability for storing descriptions for Build projects in the backend

we’ve just never shown this / allowed users to set this on the frontend

i’ll create an EPD ticket for this
Oh interesting. Is there a historical reason why we decided not to expose this in the frontend?
no historical reason, probably just de-prioritized and we never got back to it
Going to bump it on our backlog then
We can go to office hours for this one
